metadata.name: Evening at the cemetery
metadata.description:
I present to you, magical fairy-tale images, inside a rotating cube.
This is"Evening at the cemetery"
19sec video loop
1080p
50fps
It is depicted on the moving cube
the guardian angel in a cemetery.
While the constant elements of the fairy tale are Death, the full moon and the crow.
The main programs that
used to create the artwork:
Photoshop, Collage Maker, Mirror Lab, In shot Video  and Artificial Intelligence.

🖌️🎨📷📲   Art on the Go®️
🎬Artwork created exclusively
 on smartphone 🤳

All rights , except music ,will be released to the buyer after the NFT is purchased.The artist, Anestis Fotiadis "anestain" hereby grants a worldwide copyright license to download, distribute, and use as wished without prior permission required from the artist or NFT owner.
The license takes effect once the NFT has sold and not before.
Royalty-free music for presentation only.
Music album Dreamland
Music piece Henderson.
